content: vinya is a beanie style hat featuring cute little hearts simple to knit this hat would make a great first stranded colourwork project vinya is knit in the round from the bottom up the stranded colourwork heart section is chart only **materials ** sportweight yarn mc red 45 50 55 60 75 yds / 40 45 50 55 70 m cc white 85 95 100 110 135 yds / 80 85 90 100 120 m 3mm / us 2 5 16 /40cm circular needle 3 25mm / us 3 16 / 40cm circular needle 3 25mm / us 3 dpns **finished measurements ** to fit toddler child adult s adult m adult l actual circumference 17 5 19 20 25 21 75 23 25 / 44 5 48 51 5 55 59 cm
